inclusion.criterion: admitted to Epilepsy Monitoring Unit for presurgical evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: discussed at the multidisciplinary epilepsy surgery team meetings
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who did not have a seizure during the monitoring
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 41 year old man with history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, epilepsy presenting with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in at his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
